explanation: To complete the task of getting a pillow from the bed, taking it to the nightstand, and turning on the lamp, the objects involved would be the Pillow, AlarmClock (assumed to be on the nightstand as a common placement), and Lamp (assumed to be on the nightstand as well). The steps would involve picking up the Pillow from the bed, walking over to the nightstand where the AlarmClock and Lamp are located, placing the Pillow on the nightstand, and then turning on the Lamp to examine the Pillow.
